<a id="Texture3DRD"></a>

# Texture3DRD

**Inherits:** [Texture3D](Texture3D.md) **\<** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Texture for 3D that is bound to a texture created on the [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This texture class allows you to use a 3D texture created directly on the [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md) as a texture for materials, meshes, etc.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
